snippet: Matt Harvey, 23, pitched six and two-third solid innings Monday for the Buffalo Bisons, leaving the Mets to decide whether his next start will be in Buffalo or Queens.
abstract: New York Mets pitching prospect Matt Harvey has a solid minor league outing, fueling speculation about when he might be called up.

byline.contributor: Aaron Mansfield contributed reporting from Buffalo.

lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey, 23, pitched six and two-third solid innings Monday for the Buffalo Bisons, leaving the Mets to decide whether his next start will be in Buffalo or Queens.

headline.seo: Matt Harvey, Mets Prospect, Pitches Well in Buffalo Start
headline.main: Prospect for Mets Shines in Buffalo
headline.print_headline: Prospect For Mets Is Sharp In Buffalo
